properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FACILITY WHERE U_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FACILITY JOIN MEMBER USING(U_NO) WHERE U_NO = ? AND FC_NAME = '독서실'

SELECT FC_NO , FC_NAME , FC_SEAT_NO , FC_DATE , FC_START , FC_END , U_NO , FC_STATUS FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , FLIST.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FACILITY JOIN MEMBER USING (U_NO) WHERE FC_NAME = '독서실' AND U_NO = ? ORDER BY FC_NO DESC) FLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT FC_NO , FC_NAME , FC_SEAT_NO , FC_DATE , FC_START , FC_END , U_NO , FC_STATUS FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , FLIST.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FACILITY JOIN MEMBER USING (U_NO) WHERE FC_NAME = '독서실' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM FC_START) = SUBSTR( ?, 6, 2) AND U_NO = ? ORDER BY FC_NO DESC) FLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
